message:
1-17-2016

Final version. Added back arrow for onscreen button to go back. Added bombs.

1-17-2016

Save games are working the html project now. Added a barrier line in the classic version.

1-16-2016

Almost finished! I've added the game over condition and game over screen.
Some cheesy effects to the menus.

1-11-2016

Mostly graphics updates. Intro screen and score counter.

1-8-2016

Bugfixes for savedGame and Options classes.

1-8-2016

Gameplay balancing and general polishing. Have an options screen that will
let you turn on or off the music. This saves to a local file.

1-3-2016

2 Game modes. Added some music. Credits screen done.

12-31-2015

Working on implementing 2 gameplay modes. Endless and Clear the level.
Added a new transporter effect for when you get a match, instead of the tribbles
flying off they are now transported to a nearby Klingon ship.

12-28-2015

Tribbles now collapse down to fill in gaps.
Tribbles will randomly spawn a new tribble beside them.
Some of the scoring and level system done.

12-26-2015

Changed the main menu to not show the option to continue if there is no saved game,
instead of showing an error message.

First bit of gameplay done. There is now a row of Tribbles that spawn at the bottom of the board, with a spawn animation.
As the row completes it moves up onto the board. Tribbles on the board will randomly show a blink animation.
You can click groups of 2 or more tribbles and they will fly off the board. Also plays a random sfx of a group of "Woot" sounds.
The tribbles don't fall down yet.

12-23-2015

More work on the random background.

12-22-2015

Game screen now shows a basic random background.
Added the savegame and saveoptions classes.

12-21-15
Updated .gitignore to not include assets. I don't want to share those.
